title: NDS Emulator with Pokemon Games
description: This torrent includes the NDS emulator Desmume 0.9.10 x86 along with 5 Pokemon Roms of your choice to play. Pokemon Heartgold and Soulsivler, Pokemon Black and White, and Pokemon Platinum. All you have to do upon download is unzip the two folders from the .rar file, run desmume, load rom into desmume, and ENJOY!!!. Hope you guys enjoy it and if you guys like it enough I will start uploading some more NDS Roms in the future. Set Sail and Don't Forget to SEED!!!!
